channel.title: Module Reference on darktable 3.5 (dev) user manual
channel.description: Recent content in Module Reference on darktable 3.5 (dev) user manual

item.title: overview
item.description: The modules in this reference section are broken down into two types: processing modules These modules are used exclusively in the darkroom view, and each performs its processing operation on the image before passing the image up to the next module for further processing. Together this sequence of processing steps forms the pixelpipe. utility modules These modules may be used in any darktable view. They are not directly involved in processing the pixels of your image; instead they perform other ancillary functions related to managing the image metadata and tags, editing history, modifying overall pixel pipeline order, snapshots and duplicates, image export and so on.
